scripts.update:translations: npm run build:i18n && npm run update:po && npm run build:mo && npm run build:js
scripts.zip: rm -rf plugin-dist && mkdir -p plugin-dist/lithe-course && rsync -av --exclude-from='.distignore' ./ plugin-dist/lithe-course && cd plugin-dist && zip -r ../lithe-course.zip lithe-course && cd .. && rm -rf plugin-dist && echo 'Plugin zipped successfully!'
